item.title: Re: How does the Readmill iPad version work?
item.content:encoded:
Hey Matt,

This is Matthew from Readmill. You can grab the iPad version by heading to hintjens[dot]com/books.

Just hit the "Send to iPad" button and it will be sent to your Readmill account. I hope this helps!

If you have any questions, drop me a direct line.

item.title: How does the Readmill iPad version work?
item.content:encoded:
When I tap on get the iPad version, it takes me to a Readmill page. That page has a get this book link that comes back here.

How does one get the iPad version of the book in the Readmill app?
